info.description: API to create,update and retrieve details for Online Upgrades.This allows the viewing of Online Upgrade's Critical Records, Non-Critical Records, Restructure File List, Feeder Drill Down, Feeder Drill Down Channel, Primary and Secondary Job times.
info.title: Online Upgrade

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

serverName.description: Contains the name of the Server on which the service will run.

workloadProfileId.description: The ID of a record that is in a multithreaded process

serverStatus.description: Status of Server  POSSIBLE VALUES: ACTIVE: To set the server as active INACTIVE: To set the server as inactive

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
